messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I believe in Britain. I am a director of a small but successful training company, a husband of 32 years, and a father of two grown up daughters. I believe that I bring something new to politics Honesty. My values are simple; Family, Friends and Communities matter. In business, if you make a profit, you pay your taxes. I am a Christian but accept everyone's right to have a difference faith or no faith. I love my country, respect its laws, and celebrate its customs and traditions. It's time to get our country back. yours sincerely, Frank Dunne

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a fairer Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to live, work and settle here.
UKIP will pour an extra £3 billion into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your pension when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee
issues.economy: SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage
issues.health: UKIP will pour an extra £3 billion into the NHS
issues.socialWelfare: SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your pension when you die.

politicalExperience.role: Director of a small but successful training company

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes UKIP policies and values with a personal note from the candidate.
